entries.name: AWS CertManager Certificate Discovery
entries.description: Discovers certificates managed through AWS Certificate Manager (ACM), and retrieves metadata.

entries.name: AWS SecretManager Certificates Discovery
entries.description: Discovers certificate-type secrets stored in AWS Secrets Manager and retrieves metadata.

entries.name: Concert Certificate Flows
entries.description: Provides a collection of reusable certificate workflows for discovery, rotation, and validation across supported platforms.

entries.name: Discover Certificates With Network Scan
entries.description: Workflow to Perform a network-wide scan of IP ranges and ports to identify exposed TLS/SSL certificates and retrieve certificate details.

entries.name: Discover Public Access Points From Kubernetes And OCP
entries.description: This flow discovers Public Access Point data from Kubernetes and OCP, transforms the data and ingests the data to IBM Concert.

entries.name: HashiCorp VaultCertificate Discovery and Rotation
entries.description: Discovers HashiCorp Vault certificates and performs rotation when certificates are close to expiry.

entries.name: IBM DataPower Certificates DiscoveryandRotation
entries.description: Discovers certificates deployed on IBM DataPower gateways and performs rotation when certificates are close to expiry.

entries.name: IBMCloud SecretManager Certificates discoveryAndRotation
entries.description: This flow obtains a list of certificates in IBM Secrets Manager that is decoded, and then formed in JSON format and returned, ready to be ingested by IBM Concert.

entries.name: Kubeadm Certificates Discover And Renew
entries.description: This flow discovers Kubernetes kubeadm certificates, decodes and formats them in JSON, and performs batch renewal of the identified certificates using kubeadm.

entries.name: Kubernetes Certificate Discovery
entries.description: This flow obtains a list of certificates in AWS Certificate Manager that is decoded, and then formed in JSON format and returned, ready to be ingested by IBM Concert.

entries.name: Linux Tomcat Certificates DiscoveryandRotation
entries.description: This workflow connects to Linux machines to discover certificates, ingest them into Concert, manage and generate self-signed Java/Tomcat certificates, and rotate selected certificates by renewing them in the specified keystores.

entries.name: SSH Key Discovery And Renewal
entries.description: Discovers SSH host keys and user keys across systems, identifies weak or expiring keys, and renews them securely.

entries.name: Windows RDP Certificate Rotation
entries.description: Discovers and rotates certificates configured for Windows Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) to ensure secure connectivity.

entries.name: Windows Tomcat Certificates DiscoveryandRotation
entries.description: This workflow connects to a Windows machine to fetch certificates from the keystore, ingests them into Concert, and manages the Java/Tomcat keystore by generating self-signed certificates and safely restarting the Tomcat server.
